title: Toggle the developer mode
description: When true, Fig will not cache completion specs and will load specs from the directory
details: The developer mode changes the way specs are loaded

title: Set Fig's theme
description: When true, Fig will not cache completion specs and will load specs from the directory

title: Change the sort method
description: Specify how Fig should sort suggestions

title: Set the dev completions folder
description: When autocomplete.developerMode is enabled, Fig loads completion specs from the specified directory.
details: This needs to be an absolute path

title: Wrap around
description: A flag that determines whether the selection will wrap around when pressing arrow key at bottom or top of list.

title: Insert Space automatically
description: A flag that determines whether Fig will automatically insert a space.

title: Run dangerous commands
description: A flag that determines whether Fig will present suggestions to immediately run commands that might be dangerous, like rm.

title: Git aliases
description: A flag that determines whether Fig will present suggestions to immediately run git aliases.

title: Execute after space
description: A flag that determines whether Fig will add the immediate insert suggestion to the top of the suggestions after a user hits space.

title: Set commands where Fig should be disabled
description: Pass in a JSON array of commands Fig should not autocomplete on.
details: This must be a comma-separated list of values (e.g. git,npm)

title: Set Enter behavior
description: Set the behavior of the enter key.

title: Set Tab behavior
description: Set the behavior of the tab key.

title: Autocomplete window height
description: Set the maximum height of the autocomplete window.

title: Autocomplete window width
description: Set the maximum width of the autocomplete window.

title: Set Fuzzysearch
description: Search of suggestions using fuzzy search rather than prefix search.
details: This currently does not support the tab autocomplete underlining that prefix search has

title: Set the path of the pseudoterminal
description: The $PATH variable used in pseudoterminals. If autocomplete isn't showing file suggestions, running fig settings pty.path  "$PATH" may fix the issue. You will need to restart Fig for the changes to apply.

title: Filepath for file to be sourced
description: A file that will be sourced when Fig creates a pseudoterminal

title: Launch Fig on Start
description: A flag that determines whether the Fig app is added to Login Items. If true, Fig will launch automatically whenever you restart your computer.

title: Hide menu bar icon
description: Hide Fig's icon ◧ in the Mac status bar

title: Telemetry
description: Opt-out of all non-essential telemetry collection. By default, Fig collects limited usage information to provide support and improve the product. Read our statement on privacy for more details.
